name: Inflammation
description:
Move: WASD or Direction Buttons

Fire: Space

You are a body guard named Cell. Your body has been infiltrated by a mysterious enemy that is quickly killing you. You can't find any of your fellow guards and every organ has been overrun by sickness. 

The world grows cold.

 Use your trusty flamethrower to keep this body alive and annihilate your foes.

Estimated playtime: 45 mins. Headphone recommended.
